org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor

类 TaskManagerServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor.TaskManagerServices

  • public class TaskManagerServices
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for TaskExecutor services such as the MemoryManager, IOManager, NetworkEnvironment.

                                                    ResourceID resourceID)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception

        参数:
        resourceID - resource ID of the task manager
        taskManagerServicesConfiguration - task manager configuration
        返回:
        task manager components
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        返回:

      • calculateNetworkBufferMemory

        public static long calculateNetworkBufferMemory(long totalJavaMemorySize,
                                                Configuration config)
        Calculates the amount of memory used for network buffers based on the total memory to use and the according configuration parameters.

        The following configuration parameters are involved:

        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION,
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN,
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX, and
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_NUM_BUFFERS (fallback if the ones above do not exist)
        .
        参数:
        totalJavaMemorySize - overall available memory to use (heap and off-heap, in bytes)
        config - configuration object
        返回:
        memory to use for network buffers (in bytes)

      • calculateNetworkBufferMemory

        public static long calculateNetworkBufferMemory(TaskManagerServicesConfiguration tmConfig)
        Calculates the amount of memory used for network buffers inside the current JVM instance based on the available heap or the max heap size and the according configuration parameters.

        For containers or when started via scripts, if started with a memory limit and set to use off-heap memory, the maximum heap size for the JVM is adjusted accordingly and we are able to extract the intended values from this.

        The following configuration parameters are involved:

        • TaskManagerOptions.MANAGED_MEMORY_FRACTION,
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION,
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN,
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX, and
        • TaskManagerOptions.NETWORK_NUM_BUFFERS (fallback if the ones above do not exist)
        .
        参数:
        tmConfig - task manager services configuration object
        返回:
        memory to use for network buffers (in bytes)

      • calculateHeapSizeMB

        public static long calculateHeapSizeMB(long totalJavaMemorySizeMB,
                                       Configuration config)
        Calculates the amount of heap memory to use (to set via -Xmx and -Xms) based on the total memory to use and the given configuration parameters.
        参数:
        totalJavaMemorySizeMB - overall available memory to use (heap and off-heap)
        config - configuration object
        返回:
        heap memory to use (in megabytes)

      • checkTempDirs

        private static void checkTempDirs(java.lang.String[] tmpDirs)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Validates that all the directories denoted by the strings do actually exist or can be created, are proper directories (not files), and are writable.
        参数:
        tmpDirs - The array of directory paths to check.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if any of the directories does not exist and cannot be created or is not writable or is a file, rather than a directory.
